org.jetel.ctl

Class ProblemReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.ctl.ProblemReporter

  • public class ProblemReporter
extends java.lang.Object
    Collector of diagnostic messages. Serves also for passing the information about error occurrence between CTL phases.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • setImportFileUrl

        public void setImportFileUrl(java.lang.String importFileUrl)
        Sets the URL of import file being currently processed. All errors reported will be related to this file. Set to null for 'current' file
        Parameters:
        importFileUrl - URL of import file being processed or null for current file
